member.name: T:FinanceManager.Domain.ValueObject
member.summary: Base class for value objects. Value objects are compared by their set of equality components rather than by identity. Derive from this class and implement to provide the sequence of components that determine equality.

member.summary: Returns an ordered sequence of components that participate in equality comparisons for the value object. Implementations should yield components in a stable order and include nulls when appropriate.
member.returns: An of components used for equality and hash code generation.

member.name: M:FinanceManager.Domain.ValueObject.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current value object. Two value objects are equal when they are of the same runtime type and their equality components are equal in sequence order.
member.param: The object to compare with the current value object.
member.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current value object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FinanceManager.Domain.ValueObject.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code based on the equality components returned by . The implementation combines component hash codes to produce a stable hash for the value object.
member.returns: An integer hash code for the current value object.
